about_the_game:
Step into a neon lit cyberpunk world where survival means more than just holding on. As the volunteer you have agreed to lay your life on the line to hold back the hordes of undead while the city performs a full evacuation of its civilians. In this fast paced zombie wall defence game you'll face off against the ever growing waves of undead, using strategy to survive and protect Kron City in its time of need. 

Key Features:
- Wall Defence Mechanics: Build Robots and Turrets to help you defend the wall against the growing hordes. Upgrade and Repair the wall door to ensure the undead stay out.
- Endless waves of undead: With each wave the horde will only grow larger and more powerful so be prepared for one hell of a fight
- Upgradeable Tech and Weapons: Your plasma rifle, Robots and Turrets can all be upgraded to make them shoot faster and hit harder, don't wait and be caught off guard.


PREPARE FOR THE FIGHT OF YOUR LIFE!

Remember its not about if the wall falls its about when, so dig in your heels, grab your nearest robot friend and get ready for the final and only battle that matter! Kron City Needs you Volunteer!

name: The Wall Demo
short_description: Defend the city, Fight the dead. In this fast paced zombie wall defence game set in a neon cyberpunk world, you must man the wall, upgrade defences and build robots and turrets. Face relentless waves of undead as you hold out as long as you can. Its not about if the wall falls its about when.
